figure_1: This figure shows the number of articles identified, screened, assessed, and included as part of the literature search process.
figure_2: This figure shows the number and percent of Delphi articles published in each decade, starting from 1960.
figure_3: This figure shows the number and percent of Delphi articles published by discipline, including medicine, science and technology, social sciences, and other, separately for Delphi application and methodological articles, as well as combined.
figure_4: This figure shows the number and percent of Delphi articles published by discipline, including medicine, science and technology, social sciences, and other, in each decade, starting from the 1960s.
